![](https://www.deepnetsolutions.com/img/logo.png)

Founded in 2011, DeepNet Solutions is a Web Hosting and VPS provider. We were before know on the name of Gestion DBI. Our mission is to provide virtualization solutions at highly competitive price with the Best Quality! We offer multitude of hosting services like web hosting, game server hosting and of course, VPS hosting.

Use this limited promotion to start your website : SWH50OFF (50% OFF Recurring) 
This promotion also apply to our Annual plan!

    50GB Bandwidth
    5 Email Accounts
    2 MySQL Databases
    15 Sub Domains
    5 FTP Accounts
    1 shared IPv4
    DDoS protected

**Bonus! First 4 annual order for a Shared Hosting Plan, will receive a free Comodo Positive SSL certificate  + a free dedicated IP for the year!** _(Manual activation)_



********************** Others informations **********************

Limit of one promotion by order. Expiration date for this promotion : January 4, 2015.

All our plan come with: Softaculous Auto Installer, cPanel control panel, Cloudflare integration, Included DNS management, and more.

LookingGlass (Use Canada for OUR network): https://www.deepnetsolutions.com/looking-glass.html
